item.description:
Our BNI Chapter, North Shore Networkers, invites anyone interested in sharing and connecting to come visit. BNI, the world's largest business networking organization, allows members to share ideas, contacts and most importantly, business referrals.
Our social gatherings, held monthly, enable participants to share, collaborate, engage and refer business to one another. Come meet our members in a casual setting and consider visiting our Chapter for a regular meeting. Weekly meetings are help each Thursday morning, 7 am, at Our Savior Luther Church, 478 Boston Street, in Topsfield, MA.
item.name: North Shore Networkers
